shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_init_1=mv_x=64;mv_y=48;
per_frame_init_2=dcsp=0;
per_frame_init_3=
per_frame_init_4=zoom = 1.0;
per_frame_init_5=warp = 0;
per_frame_init_6=rot = 0;
per_frame_init_7=dx = 0;
per_frame_init_8=dy = 0;
per_frame_init_9=sx = 1;
per_frame_init_10=sy = -1;
per_frame_init_11=cx = 0.5;
per_frame_init_12=cy = 0.5;
per_frame_init_13=
per_frame_1=decay = 0.97;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=//uncommenting this block will make decay start at 0 when preset begins, and rise to the "max_decay" value
per_frame_4=//max_decay = 0.97;
per_frame_5=//dcsp = dcsp + 0.007*(75/fps);
per_frame_6=//dcsp = min(dcsp , max_decay);
per_frame_7=//decay = dcsp;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=//volume, and volume based time. framerate adjusted
per_frame_10=vol = (bass+mid+treb)*0.25;
per_frame_11=vol = vol*vol;
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=mtime = mtime + vol * 0.01 * (75/fps);
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=q1 = vol;
per_frame_16=q2 = 3.1415/2 + sin(time/3)*0.01;
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=//non bass volume
per_frame_19=vol2 = (mid+treb)*0.33;
per_frame_20=vol2 = vol2*vol2;
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=m2time = m2time + vol2 * 0.01 * (75/fps);
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=q3 = vol2;
per_frame_25=q4 = m2time;
per_frame_26=
per_frame_27=
per_frame_28=//krash's beat detection code
per_frame_29=volume = 0.3*(bass+mid+att);
per_frame_30=beatrate = equal(beatrate,0) + (1-equal(beatrate,0))*(below(volume,0.01) + (1-below(volume,0.01))*beatrate);
per_frame_31=lastbeat = lastbeat + equal(lastbeat,0)*time;
per_frame_32=meanbass_att = 0.1*(meanbass_att*9 + bass_att);
per_frame_33=peakbass_att = max(bass_att,peakbass_att);
per_frame_34=beatrate = max(if(beat,if(below(time-lastbeat,2*beatrate),0.1*(beatrate*9 + time - lastbeat),beatrate),beatrate),0.1);
per_frame_35=peakbass_att = beat*bass_att + (1-beat)*peakbass_att*(above(time - lastbeat, 2*beatrate)*0.95 + (1-above(time - lastbeat, 2*beatrate))*0.995);
per_frame_36=lastbeat = beat*time + (1-beat)*lastbeat;
per_frame_37=peakbass_att = max(peakbass_att,1.1*meanbass_att);
per_frame_38=beat = above(volume,0.8)*below(peakbass_att - bass_att, 0.05*peakbass_att)*above(time - lastbeat, 0.1 + 0.5*(beatrate - 0.1));
per_frame_39=beatcounter = beatcounter + beat;
per_frame_40=mode = if(beat*equal(beatcounter%2,0),1-mode,mode);
per_frame_41=flip = 2*mode-1;
per_frame_42=
per_frame_43=beatdrop = if( equal(beatdrop,0) , beat , max(beatdrop - 0.02*(75/fps) , 0) );
per_frame_44=
per_frame_45=q7 = beatdrop;
per_frame_46=
per_frame_47=q8 = 10;
per_frame_48=gamma = 1 + beatdrop*0.28;
per_frame_49=decay = 0.98;
per_frame_50=
per_frame_51=
per_frame_52=
per_frame_53=
per_frame_54=zoom = 0.99 + beatdrop*0.1;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_fw_clouds;
warp_2=`shader_body
warp_3=`{
warp_4=`    // sample previous frame
warp_5=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz-GetBlur1(uv);
warp_6=`ret+=tex2D(sampler_fw_clouds,uv)*0.5;
warp_7=`}
comp_1=`float2 d, uv_y;
comp_2=`float3 dx, dy;
comp_3=`shader_body
comp_4=`{
comp_5=`
comp_6=` float zoom =1.81;
comp_7=` float2 c = float2(0.448+q9,0.701+q10);
comp_8=` float2 my_uv2 = (uv-0.5)*zoom;
comp_9=` my_uv2 = float2(my_uv2.x*my_uv2.x - my_uv2.y*my_uv2.y, 2*my_uv2.x*my_uv2.y) + c;
comp_10=` my_uv2 = 1.0 - abs( frac( my_uv2 * 0.5 ) * 2.0 - 1.0 ); // Eo.S' mirror code
comp_11=`
comp_12=` float julia = GetPixel(my_uv2).z;
comp_13=`
comp_14=`    d = texsize.zw*3;
comp_15=`    dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_16=`    dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_17=`
comp_18=`float3 base = GetPixel(uv);
comp_19=`float3 emboss = (-dx + dy + 1)*1.4;
comp_20=`float grad_x = length(float2(dx.x,dy.x));
comp_21=`float grad_y = length(float2(dx.y,dy.y));
comp_22=`
comp_23=`
comp_24=`ret = lerp( float3(0.6,0.5,0.4)*base.x*emboss.x,
comp_25=`            float3(4,2,1)*grad_x,
comp_26=`            grad_x*2
comp_27=`          ); 
comp_28=`
comp_29=`
comp_30=`ret = lerp(ret, float3(0.3,0,0), julia*4);
comp_31=`ret = lerp(ret, float3(0,0,1.4), grad_y*1.4);
comp_32=`ret = lerp(ret, 0.5, base.y*2);
comp_33=`}
comp_34=`
